text: Good morning Staff. Good morning Crestians. One time I got 9 hours of detention for not bringing a thermometer for temperature taking. Another time I walked in to a fellow student vaping in the toilet. He told me not to tell anyone so i didn't. It was a truly enriching experience which helped me excell in my studies! I hope that more students are able to experience the wonders that this school is able to offer to its students.
